meta.name: Political Modern
meta.description: 现代政工风格，红白简洁，适合青年学习、新时代宣传

base.container: background-color: #fafafa; color: #333333; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8; padding: 20px;

headings.h2: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #e60000, #ff3333); color: #ffffff; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 19px; font-weight: 600; margin: 24px 0 16px; border-radius: 4px;
headings.h3: color: #e60000; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; margin: 20px 0 12px; padding-left: 12px; border-left: 4px solid #ff3333;
headings.h1: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #e60000, #ff3333); color: #ffffff; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 19px; font-weight: 600; margin: 24px 0 16px; border-radius: 4px;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #ffffff; color: #333333; padding: 16px; border-radius: 6px; margin: 18px 0; border: 2px solid #ffe6e6;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fff9e6; border-left: 4px solid #ff9900; color: #cc6600; padding: 12px 18px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #ffe6e6; border-left: 4px solid #e60000; color: #990000; padding: 12px 18px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #e60000, transparent); margin: 32px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #ffe6e6; border: 2px dashed #e60000; color: #e60000; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 8px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 40px; padding: 18px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #e6000010, #ff333310); border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; border-top: 2px solid #e60000;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
